page.title: 02Housing
page.content: Local Authority Housing is classified in two groups. (a) Flats (4 in a block) and semi-detached cottages built about 1919. (b) Post war from 1948 which are a mix of Multi-Storey (3 or more high), Terraced Rows, Maisonettes and semi-detached houses. The Housing Manager has 2400 houses under her control. When financial restrictions are lifted, demolition of housing in an area known as Cooper Ha' is to be considered. 420 houses are owner-occupied, which category should increase if tenants buy their council houses. The N.C.B and farmers own property in this area.
